about.bio: Hey there! I am currently a sophomore with an eager to learn various development skills. I am enthusiastic in Web3 and Blockchain Technologies and currently learning the same. Besides coding, I love web and movie series(es). My hobbies include video games and playing Guitar. Feel free to contact me for anything :)
